Biographies

  • Juvenile biography

    Terius Gray is better known by his stage name, Juvenile, and is an American hip-hop rapper from New Orleans, Lousiana.

    Read more
  • Mystikal biography

    Mystikal (born September 22, 1970) is the stage and recording name of Michael Tyler, an American hip-hop rapper and actor, hailing from New Orleans, Louisiana, U.S.

    Read more
  • 8ball & MJG biography

    8Ball & MJG (formed in 1991) are a American hip-hop duo who rose to prominence in the nineties following their 1993 debut album “Comin’ Out Hard”, hailing from Memphis, Tennessee, U.S.

    Read more
  • Doug E. Fresh biography

    Doug E. Fresh is a hip-hop artist hailing from Harlem, New York, United States who was born on September 17th, 1966. Since debuting in 1983 he has released four studio albums along with a host of singles, and is famous …

  • Slick Rick biography

    Slick Rick (born January 14, 1965) is the stage name of Richard Walters an English-American Rapper born in London, UK.
